parameters.name: regionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the instance resides.

parameters.name: resourceGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the resource group to which the instance is changed.

You can call the [ListResourceGroups](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/resource-management/latest/listresourcegroups) operation to query existing resource groups.

parameters.name: resourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource. Set this parameter to the ID of the ApsaraMQ forÂ RocketMQ instance whose resource group you want to change.

parameters.name: resourceType
parameters.description:
The type of resource.

Set this parameter to **instance**. The value of this parameter cannot be changed.
